If damage is prevented this way, CARDNAME deals that much damage to target creature or player.

0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may reveal it and put a quest counter on CARDNAME.\nAt the beginning of each end step, if there are three or more quest counters on CARDNAME, you may put a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.source: Selective Memory
trans-unit.target: 选择性记忆

trans-unit.resname: WWK·37 | Selective Memory | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for any number of nonland cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻任意数量的非地牌，并将它们放逐。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "I of all people know that memory is not a safe place to hide valuables."\n—Jace Beleren
trans-unit.target: 「在所有人之中，我最清楚记忆不是埋藏珍贵东西的安全地点。」 ～杰斯贝连

trans-unit.source: Spell Contortion
trans-unit.target: 扭曲咒语

trans-unit.resname: WWK·38 | Spell Contortion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Multikicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} any number of times as you cast this spell.)\nCounter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Draw a card for each time CARDNAME was kicked.
trans-unit.target: 多重增幅{1}{U} （你施放此咒语时可以任意次数地额外支付{1}{U}。) 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{2}，否则反击该咒语。 CARDNAME每增幅过一次，就抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Surrakar Banisher
trans-unit.target: 退敌苏拉卡

trans-unit.resname: WWK·39 | Surrakar Banisher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将目标已横置的生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Surrakar grab things they *don't* want.
trans-unit.target: 苏拉卡拿他们不要的东西。

trans-unit.resname: WWK·40 | Thada Adel, Acquisitor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thada Adel, Acquisitor
trans-unit.target: 巧取者札妲艾迪

trans-unit.resname: WWK·40 | Thada Adel, Acquisitor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Islandwalk\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, search that player's library for an artifact card and exile it. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.
trans-unit.target: 海岛行者 每当CARDNAME对牌手造成战斗伤害时，从该牌手的牌库中搜寻一张神器牌并将它放逐。 然后该牌手将他的牌库洗牌。 直到回合结束，你可以使用该牌。

trans-unit.source: Tideforce Elemental
trans-unit.target: 潮力元素

trans-unit.resname: WWK·41 | Tideforce Elemental | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {U}, {T}: You may tap or untap another target creature.\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {U}，{T}：你可以横置或重置另一个目标生物。 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你可以重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Ebb and flow, high tide and low, quick as sand and just as slow.
trans-unit.target: 红尘滚滚，潮起潮落。

trans-unit.source: Treasure Hunt
trans-unit.target: 寻宝

trans-unit.resname: WWK·42 | Treasure Hunt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card, then put all cards revealed this way into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库顶开始展示牌，直到你展示出一张非地牌为止，然后将所有以此法展示的牌置于你手上。

trans-unit.source: "The longer the journey, the more one learns."\n—Isanke, Halimar seastalker
trans-unit.target: 「旅程越长，学到的越多。」 ～哈利玛海袭人鱼伊珊格

trans-unit.source: Twitch
trans-unit.target: 抽搐

trans-unit.source: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 你可以横置或重置目标神器、生物、或者地。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The flow is diverted. Your path is clear. What are you waiting for—the cave to bid you welcome?"\n—Maizah Shere, Tazeem lullmage
trans-unit.target: 「能量流动已经改道。 你的路已开通了。 你还在等什么～要洞窟挥手欢迎你吗？」 ～塔晋息法师麦札席尔

trans-unit.source: Vapor Snare
trans-unit.target: 蒸汽套索

trans-unit.resname: WWK·44 | Vapor Snare | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nYou control enchanted creature.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice CARDNAME unless you return a land you control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 你操控所结附的生物。 在你的维持开始时，除非你将由你操控的一个地移回其拥有者手上，否则牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Voyager Drake
trans-unit.target: 飞航龙兽

trans-unit.resname: WWK·45 | Voyager Drake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Multikicker {U} (You may pay an additional {U} any number of times as you cast this spell.)\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, up to X target creatures gain flying until end of turn, where X is the number of times CARDNAME was kicked.
trans-unit.target: 多重增幅{U} （你施放此咒语时可以任意次数地额外支付{U}。) 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，至多X个目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束，X为CARDNAME增幅过的次数。

trans-unit.source: Wind Zendikon
trans-unit.target: 行风赞迪肯

trans-unit.resname: WWK·46 | Wind Zendikon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant land\nEnchanted land is a 2/2 blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land.\nWhen enchanted land is put into a graveyard, return that card to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 结附于地 所结附的地是2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的元素生物。 它仍然是地。 当所结附的地置入坟墓场时，将该牌移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Abyssal Persecutor
trans-unit.target: 深渊虐魔

trans-unit.resname: WWK·47 | Abyssal Persecutor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, trample\nYou can't win the game and your opponents can't lose the game.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏 你这盘游戏不会赢，对手也不会输。

trans-unit.source: His slaves crave death more than they desire freedom. He denies them both.
trans-unit.target: 比起希冀自由，他的奴隶还更渴求一死。 但他两者都不许。

trans-unit.source: Agadeem Occultist
trans-unit.target: 艾格丁神秘学者

trans-unit.resname: WWK·48 | Agadeem Occultist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control if its converted mana cost is less than or equal to the number of Allies you control.
trans-unit.target: {T}：如果对手坟墓场中的目标生物牌之总法术力费用等于或小于由你操控的伙伴数量，则将该牌在你的操控下放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: WWK·49 | Anowon, the Ruin Sage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Anowon, the Ruin Sage
trans-unit.target: 遗迹智者亚诺文

trans-unit.resname: WWK·49 | Anowon, the Ruin Sage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player sacrifices a non-Vampire creature.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，每位牌手牺牲一个非吸血鬼的生物。

trans-unit.resname: WWK·49 | Anowon, the Ruin Sage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "So many have died in search of that map. And now it appears in the hands of the arrogant child Chandra Nalaar."
trans-unit.target: 「很多人为了寻找那地图而丧命。 而现在它出现在茜卓纳拉这骄傲小鬼的手上。」

trans-unit.source: Bloodhusk Ritualist
trans-unit.target: 血躯仪式师

trans-unit.resname: WWK·50 | Bloodhusk Ritualist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Multikicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} any number of times as you cast this spell.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card for each time it was kicked.
trans-unit.target: 多重增幅{B} （你施放此咒语时可以任意次数地额外支付{B}。) 当CARDNAME进战场时，它每增幅过一次，目标对手就弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Bojuka Brigand
trans-unit.target: 泊卒卡强盗

trans-unit.resname: WWK·51 | Bojuka Brigand | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't block.\nWhenever CARDNAME or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能进行阻挡。 每当CARDNAME或另一个伙伴在你的操控下进战场时，你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "I don't do tactics. I don't do guard duty. I do damage. Take it or leave it."
trans-unit.target: 「我不搞计谋。 我不站卫哨。 我只砍人。 要就要，不要拉倒。」

trans-unit.resname: WWK·52 | Brink of Disaster | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Brink of Disaster
trans-unit.target: 灾祸边缘

trans-unit.resname: WWK·52 | Brink of Disaster | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature or land\nWhen enchanted permanent becomes tapped, destroy it.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物或地 当所结附的永久物成为横置时，将它消灭。

trans-unit.resname: WWK·52 | Brink of Disaster | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You always have a choice. That doesn't mean you always have a good choice."\n—Alubri, Guul Draz gatekeeper
trans-unit.target: 「你一直都有得选择。 这并不代表你总是作出好的选择。」 ～古坠兹门卫阿罗比

trans-unit.resname: WWK·53 | Butcher of Malakir | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Butcher of Malakir
trans-unit.target: 马拉奇屠夫

trans-unit.resname: WWK·53 | Butcher of Malakir | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME or another creature you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME或由你操控的另一个生物从战场进入坟墓场时，每位对手便牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.resname: WWK·53 | Butcher of Malakir | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.
trans-unit.target: 他永远判定有罪。 他总是裁决处死。

trans-unit.source: Caustic Crawler
trans-unit.target: 腐液爬虫

trans-unit.resname: WWK·54 | Caustic Crawler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你可以使目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Novice explorers can mistake the acid-carved stone lairs for ancient ruins. They rarely survive to learn better.
trans-unit.target: 新手探险家会把他们因酸蚀刻的石地巢穴当成古老遗迹。 他们很少有机会活着学到教训。

trans-unit.source: Corrupted Zendikon
trans-unit.target: 腐化赞迪肯

trans-unit.resname: WWK·55 | Corrupted Zendikon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant land\nEnchanted land is a 3/3 black Ooze creature. It's still a land.\nWhen enchanted land is put into a graveyard, return that card to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 结附于地 所结附的地是3/3黑色的流浆生物。 它仍然是地。 当所结附的地置入坟墓场时，将该牌移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Dead Reckoning
trans-unit.target: 亡者报复

trans-unit.resname: WWK·56 | Dead Reckoning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. If you do, CARDNAME deals damage equal to that card's power to target creature.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将目标生物牌从你坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。 如果你如此作，则CARDNAME对目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于该牌的力量。

trans-unit.source: Many venture out to hunt for treasures. Others lie in wait to hunt the hunters.
trans-unit.target: 许多人为寻宝而出发冒险。 其他的则躺着要猎杀猎人。

trans-unit.source: Death's Shadow
trans-unit.target: 死亡阴影

trans-unit.resname: WWK·57 | Death's Shadow | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME得-X/-X，X为你的总生命。

trans-unit.source: The shadow of the candle looms tall even as its light grows dim.
trans-unit.target: 蜡烛火光渐弱，而其阴影愈显高大。

trans-unit.source: Jagwasp Swarm
trans-unit.target: 锯齿蜂大群

trans-unit.resname: WWK·58 | Jagwasp Swarm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: "You know how to tell a sapling explorer from an old hardhead? See which one mistakes a swarm of jagwasps for the setting sun."\n—Chadir the Navigator
trans-unit.target: 「你知道该怎么分辨青涩探险家与老经验好手吗？ 只要看谁会把一群锯齿蜂当成是夕阳。」 ～领航者洽迪

trans-unit.source: Kalastria Highborn
trans-unit.target: 卡列奇望族

trans-unit.resname: WWK·59 | Kalastria Highborn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another Vampire you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或由你操控的另一个吸血鬼从战场进入坟墓场时，你可以支付{B}。 若你如此作，则目标牌手失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Each of Malakir's great families boasts a contingent of nulls appropriate to its rank in society.
trans-unit.target: 马拉奇的每个大家族，都拥有与其社会地位相衬的大群躯壳随行。

trans-unit.source: Mire's Toll
trans-unit.target: 泥沼召唤

trans-unit.resname: WWK·60 | Mire's Toll | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player reveals a number of cards from his or her hand equal to the number of Swamps you control. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手从手上展示若干牌，其数量等同由你操控的沼泽数量。 你从中选择一张。 该牌手弃掉该牌。

trans-unit.source: As the bridge snapped, Berko was sure he heard the swamp laughing at him.
trans-unit.target: 当桥断开时，柏可很确定自己听到沼泽嘲笑着他。

trans-unit.source: Nemesis Trap
trans-unit.target: 报应陷阱

trans-unit.resname: WWK·61 | Nemesis Trap | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If a white creature is attacking, you may pay {B}{B} rather than pay CARDNAME's mana cost.\nExile target attacking creature. Put a creature token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 如果白色生物进行攻击，你可以支付{B}{B}，而不支付CARDNAME的法术力费用。 放逐目标进行攻击的生物。 将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为该生物之复制。 在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它放逐。

trans-unit.source: Pulse Tracker
trans-unit.target: 心搏追猎人

trans-unit.resname: WWK·62 | Pulse Tracker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, each opponent loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，每位对手各失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Pulse trackers terrorize adventurers, driving them through the jungle toward certain death at the gates of Malakir.
trans-unit.target: 心搏追猎人会惊吓冒险者，驱赶他们越过丛林、抵达必死无疑的马拉奇大门。

trans-unit.source: Quag Vampires
trans-unit.target: 湿沼吸血鬼

trans-unit.resname: WWK·63 | Quag Vampires | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Multikicker {1}{B} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} any number of times as you cast this spell.)\nSwampwalk\nCARDNAME enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.
trans-unit.target: 多重增幅{1}{B} （你施放此咒语时可以任意次数地额外支付{1}{B}。) 沼泽行者 CARDNAME进场时上面有数个+1/+1指示物，其数量为它增幅过的次数。

trans-unit.resname: WWK·64 | Quest for the Nihil Stone | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Quest for the Nihil Stone
trans-unit.target: 探索返虚石

trans-unit.resname: WWK·64 | Quest for the Nihil Stone | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may put a quest counter on CARDNAME.\nAt the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has no cards in hand and CARDNAME has two or more quest counters on it, you may have that player lose 5 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手弃一张牌时，你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个探索指示物。 在每位对手的维持开始时，若该牌手没有手牌、且CARDNAME上有两个或更多探索指示物，你可以令该牌手失去5点生命。

trans-unit.source: Ruthless Cullblade
trans-unit.target: 绝情汰锋兵

trans-unit.resname: WWK·65 | Ruthless Cullblade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets +2/+1 as long as an opponent has 10 or less life.
trans-unit.target: 只要任一对手的总生命为10或更少，CARDNAME便得+2/+1。

trans-unit.source: She wields a blade as bloodthirsty and elegant as herself.
trans-unit.target: 她手上长剑噬血又优雅，一如她自己。

trans-unit.source: Scrib Nibblers
trans-unit.target: 啃书鼠

trans-unit.resname: WWK·66 | Scrib Nibblers | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Exile the top card of target player's library. If it's a land card, you gain 1 life.\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {T}：放逐目标牌手的牌库顶牌。 若该牌是地牌，则你获得1点生命。 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，你可以重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Shoreline Salvager
trans-unit.target: 海岸线回收兽

trans-unit.resname: WWK·67 | Shoreline Salvager | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, if you control an Island, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，若你操控海岛，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "They search for treasures that wash up from the depths. Tracking one could lead you to riches. Or in circles."\n—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter
trans-unit.target: 「他们搜寻从深海给冲上来的宝藏。 追踪他的结局，可能是让你致富； 或是让你被围困。」 ～昂度猎宝人贾维纳金

trans-unit.source: Smother
trans-unit.target: 闷杀

trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标总法术力费用为3或更少的生物。 它不能重生。

trans-unit.source: "Before I hire new recruits, I test how long they can hold their breath. You'd be surprised how often it comes up."\n—Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader
trans-unit.target: 「我在雇用新人之前，会测试他们能憋气多久。 你绝想不到这情况竟如此常见。」 ～哈利玛探险队长萨格达

trans-unit.source: Tomb Hex
trans-unit.target: 入墓邪术

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.\nLandfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn instead.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。 地落～如果本回合中有地在你的操控下进战场，则改为该生物得-4/-4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: WWK·70 | Urge to Feed | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Urge to Feed
trans-unit.target: 饥饿驱策

trans-unit.resname: WWK·70 | Urge to Feed | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You may tap any number of untapped Vampire creatures you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those Vampires.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-3/-3直到回合结束。 你可以横置任意数量由你操控、且未横置的吸血鬼生物。 如果你如此作，则在这些吸血鬼上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Akoum Battlesinger
trans-unit.target: 阿库姆战颂人

trans-unit.resname: WWK·71 | Akoum Battlesinger | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nWhenever CARDNAME or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 每当CARDNAME或另一个伙伴在你的操控下进战场时，你可以让由你操控的伙伴生物得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Bazaar Trader
trans-unit.target: 市集贩商

trans-unit.resname: WWK·72 | Bazaar Trader | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Target player gains control of target artifact, creature, or land you control.
trans-unit.target: {T}：目标牌手获得目标由你操控的神器，生物，或地的操控权。

trans-unit.source: "No need for a hurda? How about these maps to recently discovered tombs? Or these vials of invisible potion? Very fancy . . ."
trans-unit.target: 「不需要荷得? 那这些地图呢？可以带你到最近发现的坟墓。 还是要几瓶隐身药？ 非常有用呢...」

trans-unit.source: Bull Rush
trans-unit.target: 猛力冲撞

trans-unit.resname: WWK·73 | Bull Rush | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "It's gone mad! Loose the chains and save what you can!"
trans-unit.target: 「他发疯了！ 把锁链解开，财产能救多少是多少！」

trans-unit.source: Chain Reaction

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对所有生物各造成X点伤害，X为战场上生物的数量。

trans-unit.source: "We train for the improbable, like lightning striking the same place twice, or striking everywhere at once."\n—Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain
trans-unit.target: 「我们的训练是要应付不可能的事，例如闪电两次都落在同一个地方，或是一次落在所有地方。」 ～海户义勇军队长努达力

trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 你每操控一个山脉，所结附的生物便得+1/+0且具先攻异能。

trans-unit.resname: WWK·75 | Claws of Valakut | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Swords may sunder. Shields may fail. My will is stronger than steel, and my flesh and bone far more deadly."
trans-unit.target: 「剑会断， 盾会破。 我的意志强过钢铁，肉身甚至更加精悍。」

trans-unit.source: Comet Storm

trans-unit.source: Multikicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} any number of times as you cast this spell.)\nChoose target creature or player, then choose another target creature or player for each time CARDNAME was kicked. CARDNAME deals X damage to each of them.
trans-unit.target: 多重增幅{1} （你施放此咒语时可以任意次数地额外支付{1}。) 选择目标生物或牌手，然后CARDNAME每增幅过一次，就选择另一个目标生物或牌手。 CARDNAME对它们各造成X点伤害。

trans-unit.target: 革力伯跨坐在牲口上，沿着山坡冲下去，他的葛塔兄弟在一旁鼓噪着。 嘶奇虫训练师的传说就此诞生。

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control becomes tapped, you may put a quest counter on CARDNAME.\nAs long as there are four or more quest counters on CARDNAME, untap all creatures you control during each other player's untap step.
